questions.text: How often should you brush your dentures?
questions.correct: Daily

questions.text: What should you avoid using on your dentures?
questions.correct: Regular toothpaste

questions.text: What should you do if your dentures become damaged?
questions.correct: Contact your dentist

questions.text: Why should you avoid using hot water to soak your dentures?
options: It can make them too soft
Hot water is safe for soaking
questions.correct: It can warp the dentures

questions.text: How should you handle your dentures to prevent damage?
options: Handle them over a soft surface or sink filled with water
Hold them tightly to prevent slipping
Place them directly on the countertop
questions.correct: Handle them over a soft surface or sink filled with water

questions.text: What should you do before inserting your dentures?
options: Clean your mouth by brushing your gums, tongue, and any remaining natural teeth
questions.correct: Clean your mouth by brushing your gums, tongue, and any remaining natural teeth

questions.text: How should you store your dentures when not in use?
options: In a soaking solution or water
questions.correct: In a soaking solution or water

questions.text: Why is it important to visit your dentist regularly when using dentures?
options: To adjust the fit of your dentures and check oral health
To receive new dentures every visit
questions.correct: To adjust the fit of your dentures and check oral health

questions.text: What type of foods should you start with when adapting to dentures?
questions.correct: Soft foods

questions.text: How should you use denture adhesives for best results?
options: Use them sparingly as directed by your dentist
questions.correct: Use them sparingly as directed by your dentist

questions.text: Which ancient civilization used animal teeth and human hair to create early denture-like devices?
questions.correct: The Etruscans

questions.text: What material revolutionized 19th-century denture production by making them more affordable and custom-fitted?
questions.correct: Vulcanite rubber

questions.text: What is Polymethyl Methacrylate (PMMA) commonly used for in modern dentures?
questions.correct: Denture bases

questions.text: What technology allows for highly personalized denture solutions through rapid prototyping?
questions.correct: 3D printing

questions.text: Which process involves dental implants that integrate directly with the jawbone to support dentures?
questions.correct: Osseointegration

questions.text: Why is it recommended to remove your dentures at night?
options: To give your gums a rest and reduce risk of infections
To soak them in boiling water
questions.correct: To give your gums a rest and reduce risk of infections

questions.text: What is a key benefit of visiting a dentist regularly if you are a denture wearer?
options: Ensuring proper fit and monitoring oral health
Reducing the cost of your next denture set
questions.correct: Ensuring proper fit and monitoring oral health

questions.text: When first adjusting to dentures, what can help improve speech clarity?
options: Reading aloud or practicing speech exercises
questions.correct: Reading aloud or practicing speech exercises

questions.text: What type of cleaner should generally be avoided to prevent denture damage?
questions.correct: Abrasive household cleaners like bleach

questions.text: What is a common sign that your dentures may need adjustment or replacement?
questions.correct: Persistent soreness or difficulty chewing

questions.text: Which myth about dentures is FALSE according to the text?
options: Modern dentures can be lifelike and varied
questions.correct: Dentures look unnatural

questions.text: How often should you schedule check-ups with your dentist after getting dentures?
options: Regularly, as advised by your dentist
questions.correct: Regularly, as advised by your dentist

questions.text: What is a recommended method for preventing oral infections when wearing dentures?
options: Maintaining proper oral hygiene and cleaning dentures daily
Only rinsing dentures in water occasionally
questions.correct: Maintaining proper oral hygiene and cleaning dentures daily

questions.text: Which material introduced in the 20th century provided a lightweight and aesthetic option for denture bases?
questions.correct: PMMA (acrylic resin)

questions.text: What is one reason soft foods are recommended for new denture wearers?
options: They help the wearer adjust to chewing with dentures
They eliminate the need for regular cleaning
questions.correct: They help the wearer adjust to chewing with dentures

questions.text: What should you do if you notice tartar buildup on your dentures?
options: Use a recommended denture cleaner to remove it
questions.correct: Use a recommended denture cleaner to remove it

questions.text: Which advanced technique allows precise fitting of dentures by using digital design and manufacturing?
questions.correct: CAD/CAM technology

questions.text: Why is placing dentures in boiling water not advisable?
questions.correct: It can permanently deform them

questions.text: What is a good practice before reinserting dentures after cleaning?
options: Leaving them dry to save time
Brushing your gums, tongue, and any natural teeth
Using a hard-bristled brush on the dentures
questions.correct: Brushing your gums, tongue, and any natural teeth

questions.text: Which is a future trend mentioned in denture technology?
options: Regenerative dentistry using stem cell therapies
questions.correct: Regenerative dentistry using stem cell therapies

questions.text: What is the main advantage of implant-supported dentures?
options: They offer enhanced stability and retention
They are made of disposable materials
questions.correct: They offer enhanced stability and retention

questions.text: What should you avoid doing if your dentures feel loose?
options: Continue wearing them without consulting a dentist
Schedule a dental appointment to adjust the fit
Try bending the denture base yourself
questions.correct: Schedule a dental appointment to adjust the fit

questions.text: Which cleaning practice can help remove stubborn stains from dentures?
options: Soaking them overnight in a denture-cleaning solution
Rinsing them with plain water only
questions.correct: Soaking them overnight in a denture-cleaning solution

questions.text: What role does saliva play for denture wearers?
options: It helps keep oral tissues lubricated and can aid in denture stability
It makes the dentures slip out more easily
questions.correct: It helps keep oral tissues lubricated and can aid in denture stability

questions.text: When selecting denture-cleaning products, what should you consider?
questions.correct: Products recommended by a dentist

questions.text: Why might your dentures no longer fit even if they are not physically damaged?
options: Changes in jawbone and gum structure over time
Denture material naturally expands in cold weather
questions.correct: Changes in jawbone and gum structure over time

questions.text: What is a benefit of partial dentures compared to full dentures?
options: They replace only the missing teeth, preserving natural teeth
They are permanently fixed and never removed
questions.correct: They replace only the missing teeth, preserving natural teeth

questions.text: Which of the following might indicate poor oral hygiene under dentures?
options: Red, irritated gum tissue and bad breath
questions.correct: Red, irritated gum tissue and bad breath

questions.text: What is the purpose of a denture reline?
options: To completely remake the denture from scratch
To adjust the inner surface to improve fit and comfort
questions.correct: To adjust the inner surface to improve fit and comfort

questions.text: How can implant-supported dentures help address bone loss issues?
options: They do not help with bone loss at all
They provide a stable anchor, potentially slowing bone resorption
They remove the need for healthy gum tissue
questions.correct: They provide a stable anchor, potentially slowing bone resorption

questions.text: What is a key factor in determining how frequently dentures need replacement?
options: Wear and tear, along with changes in mouth structure
questions.correct: Wear and tear, along with changes in mouth structure

questions.text: Which statement about immediate dentures is correct?
options: They are placed right after tooth extraction
They are made from metal only
questions.correct: They are placed right after tooth extraction

questions.text: Why should you avoid skipping regular denture cleanings?
options: To prevent bacterial buildup, odors, and oral infections
questions.correct: To prevent bacterial buildup, odors, and oral infections

questions.text: What can cause dentures to appear stained over time?
options: Drinking coffee, tea, or wine without proper cleaning
Storing them in a closed container
questions.correct: Drinking coffee, tea, or wine without proper cleaning

questions.text: Which factor can help improve a denture wearer’s comfort when speaking?
options: Practice, patience, and possibly using denture adhesives
questions.correct: Practice, patience, and possibly using denture adhesives

questions.text: What should a denture wearer do if they experience persistent mouth sores?
options: Ignore them and hope they heal on their own
Visit a dentist for an adjustment or check-up
questions.correct: Visit a dentist for an adjustment or check-up

questions.text: How can balanced diets benefit denture wearers?
options: They reduce the need for cleaning
They ensure proper nutrition and may promote oral tissue health
They make dentures permanently fit better
questions.correct: They ensure proper nutrition and may promote oral tissue health

questions.text: What is one advantage of using denture-specific brushes instead of regular toothbrushes?
options: Denture-specific brushes have softer bristles designed for denture materials
They are more abrasive and remove more material
questions.correct: Denture-specific brushes have softer bristles designed for denture materials

questions.text: Why might a dentist recommend implant-supported dentures over traditional dentures?
options: Because implant-supported dentures can provide a more secure fit and reduce slipping
Because they are cheaper than traditional dentures
questions.correct: Because implant-supported dentures can provide a more secure fit and reduce slipping

questions.text: What is a potential benefit of using a denture adhesive as directed?
options: It permanently fixes dentures to gums
It can improve stability and comfort temporarily
It replaces the need for dentist visits
questions.correct: It can improve stability and comfort temporarily

questions.text: When cleaning dentures, why is it advised to fill the sink with water or place a towel beneath?
options: To provide a cushion and prevent breakage if dentures are dropped
questions.correct: To provide a cushion and prevent breakage if dentures are dropped

questions.text: How can practicing speaking with dentures help a new wearer?
options: It improves muscle memory and pronunciation, helping normalize speech
It eliminates the need for further adjustments
questions.correct: It improves muscle memory and pronunciation, helping normalize speech

questions.text: What is a common reason dentures may feel less secure over time?
options: Gum and bone changes altering the denture’s fit
The dentures becoming smarter over time
The dentures shrinking due to old age
questions.correct: Gum and bone changes altering the denture’s fit
